text: Kɨ ua ian azai, Israelia asaghporegh iregh mamaghɨra ikɨ, ua daruan kogham, o? Bar puvatɨ! Guizbangɨra, men arazir kuraba bangɨn Godɨn akurvazim Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar ize. God kamaghɨn ifonge, Israelia na bagh ua izam, kamaghɨn a Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar akurvaghtɨ, me men gan naviba ikuvigh ua na bagh izam.
